sentences: Sääennusteen mukaan huomenna on todennäköisesti aurinkoa.
context: The word 'todennäköinen' means likely or probable in Finnish. It is an adjective that declines based on case and number, as shown in the dictionary definition. The root of the word comes from 'toden' (true) + 'näköinen' (looking), so it literally suggests something that looks true or has a good chance of being true.  The form provided here is the nominative singular form.
